description:
After Okabe Rintarou comes back from his failed attempt to save Makise Kurisu, Mayuri comforts him, feeling that the burden of changing the future is too much for one person to take. Left in despair over being unable to save Makise Kurisu, Okabe discards his mad scientist persona and starts living as an ordinary university student. Some time later, Okabe meets an A.I. version of Makise Kurisu.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: Kyoukaimenjou no Missing Link: Divide by Zero
境界面上のミッシングリンク -Divide By Zero-
